1567399336.description: Sets the color and optional tint of the block when rendered to a map.

color.description: Sets the color of the block when rendered to a map. The color is represented as a hex value in the format "#RRGGBB". May also be expressed as an array of [R, G, B] from 0 to 255.

tint_method.description: Sets the tint method of the block when rendered to a map. Tint method logic varies, but often refers to the "rain" and "temperature" of the biome the block is placed in to compute the tint. Supported tint methods are "none", "default_foliage", "birch_foliage", "evergreen_foliage", "dry_foliage", "grass" and "water"
tint_method.title: Tint Method

1567399336.title: Map Color

2155690250.description: The amount that light will be dampened when it passes through the block. Higher value means the light will be dampened more.
2155690250.title: Light Dampening

2208326140.description: Adds the "minecraft:cardinal_direction" and/or "minecraft:facing_direction" states and setter function to the block.

enabled_states.description: Which states to enable. Must specify at least one. Options: ["minecraft:cardinal_direction", "minecraft:facing_direction"].

y_rotation_offset.description: The y rotation offset to apply to the block. Must be [0.0, 90.0, 180.0, 270.0, 360.0]. Default is 0, meaning if the player is facing north, the "minecraft:cardinal_direction" and/or "minecraft:facing_direction" state will be north.

2208326140.title: Placement Direction

2369685306.description: Configures the block behavior in inventory and menu category

category.description: The creative inventory or recipe book tab that the block is placed into. Default to "none".
category.title: CreativeItemCategory

group.description: The expandable group that the block is a part of. Must be a namespace and can use vanilla ones

is_hidden_in_commands.description: Is the block hidden from use in commands.

2369685306.title: Menu Category

2735968029.description: Use this component to define tags, vanilla or custom. Valid tags are of the format "namespace:tag_name". The array of tags must be non-empty.
2735968029.title: Tags

2879220220.description: Specifies the language file key that maps to what text will be displayed when you hover over the block in your inventory and hotbar. If the string given can not be resolved as a loc string, the raw string given will be displayed. If this component is omitted, the name of the block will be used as the display name.
2879220220.title: Display Name

3142471136.description: Adds the "minecraft:block_face" and/or "minecraft:vertical_half" states and setter function to the block.

enabled_states.description: Which states to enable. Must specify at least one. Options: ["minecraft:block_face", "minecraft:vertical_half"].

3142471136.title: Placement Position

3463543465.description: Change the placement position and direction behavior of a block

minecraft:placement_direction.description: Adds the "minecraft:cardinal_direction" and/or "minecraft:facing_direction" states and setter function to the block.

minecraft:placement_position.description: Adds the "minecraft:block_face" and/or "minecraft:vertical_half" states and setter function to the block.

3463543465.title: Traits

3527967830.description: Sets the particles that will be used when block is destroyed. This component can be omitted.

particle_count.description: Sets number of particles to spawn on block destruction. Default is 100.

texture.description: The texture name used for the particle.

tint_method.description: Sets the tint method of the particle. Tint method logic varies, but often refers to the "rain" and "temperature" of the biome the block is placed in to compute the tint. Supported tint methods are "none", "default_foliage", "birch_foliage", "evergreen_foliage", "dry_foliage", "grass" and "water"
tint_method.title: Tint Method

3527967830.title: Destruction Particles

3655705218.description: The amount of light this block will emit. Higher value means more light will be emitted.
3655705218.title: Light Emission

oneOf.description: Must be assigned an array or a "range"

3925154510.description: Define custom states for a block that can be referenced in permutation. Each state must contain an array or a "values" with an array or a "min"/"max" range
3925154510.title: States

3993091038.description: Information about the block, must have at minimum an "identifier" and can have also the following optional field "menu_category", "states" and/or "traits"

identifier.description: Must have a namespace and can't use the "minecraft" one. Example: "namespace:my_block"

menu_category.description: Configures the block behavior in inventory and menu category

states.description: Define custom states for a block that can be referenced in permutation. Each state must contain an array or a "values" with an array or a "min"/"max" range

traits.description: Change the placement position and direction behavior of a block

3993091038.title: Description

4240371320.description: Must be assigned an array or a "range"

oneOf.description: Define a range of integer value using a "min" and "max" limit and must be assigned to "values"
oneOf.x-runtime-constraint-description: Check that the limits imposed on the range (minimum, maximum and maximum distance between values) are respected

4240371320.title: Values

minecraft:destruction_particles.description: Sets the particles that will be used when block is destroyed. This component can be omitted.

minecraft:display_name.description: Specifies the language file key that maps to what text will be displayed when you hover over the block in your inventory and hotbar. If the string given can not be resolved as a loc string, the raw string given will be displayed. If this component is omitted, the name of the block will be used as the display name.

minecraft:light_dampening.description: The amount that light will be dampened when it passes through the block. Higher value means the light will be dampened more.

minecraft:light_emission.description: The amount of light this block will emit. Higher value means more light will be emitted.

minecraft:map_color.description: Sets the color and optional tint of the block when rendered to a map.

minecraft:tags.description: Use this component to define tags, vanilla or custom. Valid tags are of the format "namespace:tag_name". The array of tags must be non-empty.

825755857.description: Define a range of integer value using a "min" and "max" limit and must be assigned to "values"
825755857.title: Range

description.description: Information about the block, must have at minimum an "identifier" and can have also the following optional field "menu_category", "states" and/or "traits"
